quote: In the long-run every Government is the exact symbol of its People, with their wisdom and unwisdom we have to say, Like People like Government.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: I learned some valuable lessons about the legislative process, the importance of bipartisan cooperation and the wisdom of taking small steps to get a big job done.

name: Charles Stanley

quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.

quote: Knowledge which is divorced from justice, may be called cunning rather than wisdom.

quote: Start with God - the first step in learning is bowing down to God only fools thumb their noses at such wisdom and learning.
name: King Solomon

quote: Both in thought and in feeling, even though time be real, to realise the unimportance of time is the gate of wisdom.

quote: I am thinking of taking a fifth wife. Why not? Solomon had a thousand wives and he is a synonym for wisdom.

quote: We must expect reverses, even defeats. They are sent to teach us wisdom and prudence, to call forth greater energies, and to prevent our falling into greater disasters.

name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Books are but waste paper unless we spend in action the wisdom we get from thought - asleep. When we are weary of the living, we may repair to the dead, who have nothing of peevishness, pride, or design in their conversation.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: Science is always discovering odd scraps of magical wisdom and making a tremendous fuss about its cleverness.

quote: What is the price of experience? Do men buy it for a song? Or wisdom for a dance in the street? No, it is bought with the price of all the man hath, his house, his wife, his children.

quote: Wisdom comes alone through suffering.

quote: I will give you a definition of a proud man: he is a man who has neither vanity nor wisdom one filled with hatreds cannot be vain, neither can he be wise.

quote: Silence is true wisdom's best reply.

quote: There is a difference between happiness and wisdom: he that thinks himself the happiest man is really so but he that thinks himself the wisest is generally the greatest fool.

quote: Some wisdom you must learn from one who's wise.

quote: They whom truth and wisdom lead, can gather honey from a weed.

name: Plautus

quote: Not by age but by capacity is wisdom acquired.
name: Plautus

quote: Experiences are savings which a miser puts aside. Wisdom is an inheritance which a wastrel cannot exhaust.

quote: You know, many people have said that I'm on the edge and I'm maverick for some of the big operations that I've done. I'm not at all. quote: Age is a terrible avenger. The lessons of life give you so much to work with, but by the time you've got all this great wisdom, you don't get to be young anymore.

quote: What if Barack Obama established a Presidential Advisory Committee that would meet once every couple of months, bringing together the former presidents for a conference in order to seek their collective wisdom? quote: Wisdom oft times consists of knowing what to do next.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: Wisdom consists not so much in knowing what to do in the ultimate as knowing what to do next.
name: Herbert Hoover

quote: All free governments are managed by the combined wisdom and folly of the people.
name: James A. Garfield

quote: In my own personal life, God plays a great role in the risk, because I pray before I go into the operating room for every case, and I ask him to give me wisdom, to help me to know what to do - and not only for operating, but for everything.

quote: No one ever found wisdom without also being a fool. Writers, alas, have to be fools in public, while the rest of the human race can cover its tracks.

quote: My mother is a great source of advice and wisdom and consolation for me.
name: Katherine Heigl

quote: Wisdom alone is true ambition's aim, wisdom is the source of virtue and of fame obtained with labour, for mankind employed, and then, when most you share it, best enjoyed.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Wisdom consists of the anticipation of consequences.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Sometimes one likes foolish people for their folly, better than wise people for their wisdom.
name: Elizabeth Gaskell

quote: I'm not wise, but the beginning of wisdom is there it's like relaxing into - and an acceptance of - things.
name: Tina Turner

quote: Wisdom is knowing when you can't be wise.
name: Paul Engle

quote: The Divine wisdom has given us prayer, not as a means whereby to obtain the good things of earth, but as a means whereby we learn to do without them not as a means whereby we escape evil, but as a means whereby we become strong to meet it.

quote: The left has come to regard common sense - the traditional wisdom and folkways of the community - as an obstacle to progress and enlightenment.

quote: I always see where I didn't do things the right way. I only see the heavy lifting. That's a bit of my wisdom, if you want to call it that.

quote: Saudi Arabia is a puritanical state that claims a monopoly of wisdom and virtue.
name: James Buchan

quote: Purity engenders Wisdom, Passion avarice, and Ignorance folly, infatuation and darkness.

quote: Vanity can easily overtake wisdom. It usually overtakes common sense.

quote: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum.

quote: I'll come to you with gifts of knowledge, wisdom and truth.

quote: Wisdom is nothing but a preparation of the soul, a capacity, a secret art of thinking, feeling and breathing thoughts of unity at every moment of life.

quote: Now that I am sixty, I see why the idea of elder wisdom has passed from currency.
name: John Updike

quote: The Founding Fathers in their wisdom decided that children were an unnatural strain on parents. So they provided jails called schools, equipped with tortures called an education.

quote: As you walk in God's divine wisdom, you will surely begin to see a greater measure of victory and good success in your life.
name: Joseph Prince

quote: Wisdom and deep intelligence require an honest appreciation of mystery.
name: Thomas Moore

quote: Now our founding fathers had the wisdom to know that social acceptance and popularity were fleeing, and that this country's principles needed to be rooted in strengths greater than the passions and the emotions of the times.
name: Chris Christie

quote: I acknowledge the privilege of being alive in a human body at this moment, endowed with senses, memories, emotions, thoughts, and the space of mind in its wisdom aspect.

quote: The art of storytelling is reaching its end because the epic side of truth, wisdom, is dying out.
name: Walter Benjamin

quote: The novelist teaches the reader to comprehend the world as a question. There is wisdom and tolerance in that attitude. In a world built on sacrosanct certainties the novel is dead.
name: Milan Kundera

quote: Focus on the mind and the soul. Read. Study. Enrol in a course of lectures. Pray. Become a member of a religious congregation. Study the Bible or other ancient works of wisdom.
name: Jonathan Sacks

quote: If you have a vaccine or an antidote that people can benefit from, you're not going to want to keep it to yourself. You're going to want to spread that wisdom or whatever to as many people as you can, so everybody can benefit from it.
name: will.i.am

quote: I have learned throughout my life as a composer chiefly through my mistakes and pursuits of false assumptions, not by my exposure to founts of wisdom and knowledge.

quote: Community organizing is all about building grassroots support. It's about identifying the people around you with whom you can create a common, passionate cause. And it's about ignoring the conventional wisdom of company politics and instead playing the game by very different rules.
name: Tom Peters

quote: The most excellent and divine counsel, the best and most profitable advertisement of all others, but the least practiced, is to study and learn how to know ourselves. This is the foundation of wisdom and the highway to whatever is good.
name: Pierre Charron

quote: Spending two years on my uncle's ranch in Montana as a young man gave me the wisdom and the thrust to do westerns.
name: Robert Duvall

quote: If an idea is indeed sensible, it will eventually become just part of the accepted wisdom.
name: Nigel Farage

quote: It's received wisdom that the English are uniquely child-unfriendly.
name: Julie Burchill

quote: Silence and reserve will give anyone a reputation for wisdom.
name: Myrtle Reed

quote: He was gifted with the sly, sharp instinct for self-preservation that passes for wisdom among the rich.
name: Evelyn Waugh

quote: The wisdom and experience of older people is a resource of inestimable worth. Recognizing and treasuring the contributions of older people is essential to the long-term flourishing of any society.
name: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: History is filled with tragic examples of wars that result from diplomatic impasse. Whether in our local communities or in international relations, the skillful use of our communicative capacities to negotiate and resolve differences is the first evidence of human wisdom.
name: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: I'm very accepting with my age. It's like notches on your belt: experience, wisdom, and a different kind of beauty. There comes a day when you've become comfortable in your skin.

quote: There is a trade off - as you grow older you gain wisdom but you lose spontaneity.

quote: One part of wisdom is knowing what you don't need anymore and letting it go.

quote: It may almost be a question whether such wisdom as many of us have in our mature years has not come from the dying out of the power of temptation, rather than as the results of thought and resolution.
name: Anthony Trollope

quote: The weak have remedies, the wise have joys superior wisdom is superior bliss.
name: Edward Young

quote: The clouds may drop down titles and estates, and wealth may seek us, but wisdom must be sought.

quote: In complete darkness, it is only knowledge and wisdom that separates us.
name: Janet Jackson

quote: We all admire the wisdom of people who come to us for advice.
name: Arthur Helps

quote: When I was at drama school, I wanted to change the world, and thought I had some great wisdom to impart to people about humanity. Now that I'm older, I know enough to realise that I know nothing at all.
name: Michael Sheen

quote: The plan was criticized by some retired military officers embedded in TV studios. But with every advance by our coalition forces, the wisdom of that plan becomes more apparent.

quote: Many people have their reputations as reporters and analysts because they are on television, batting around conventional wisdom. A lot of these people have never reported a story.

quote: Even when you have doubts, take that step. Take chances. Mistakes are never a failure - they can be turned into wisdom.

quote: In particular, for younger researchers on whom the future of mankind may depend. We believe that they are working with all the scientific wisdom at their disposal for the preservation of the inheritance of the earth and for the lasting survival of mankind.

quote: Economists often like startling theorems, results which seem to run counter to conventional wisdom.
name: Joseph Stiglitz

quote: Never say never, but the thought of electively cutting oneself is beyond my grasp, and I also object to it politically. Denying the lines on our faces makes a comment about age and wisdom I don't care to make.

name: Jane Smiley

name: Samuel Smiles

quote: The experience gathered from books, though often valuable, is but the nature of learning whereas the experience gained from actual life is one of the nature of wisdom.

quote: It is astonishing what force, purity, and wisdom it requires for a human being to keep clear of falsehoods.

quote: Evil can be a teacher, if you look at the wisdom of its negative power.

quote: Mistakes are the usual bridge between inexperience and wisdom.
name: Phyllis Theroux

quote: God in His wisdom has decided that He will reward no works but His own.
name: Johannes Tauler

quote: The all-seeing eye of God beheld our deplorable state infinite pity touched the heart of the Father of mercies and infinite wisdom laid the plan of our recovery.
name: David Brainerd

quote: I don't think I really have any wisdom. Stay out of trouble. Good luck. Stay away from women because they will burn you, haha.
name: Jason Aldean

quote: Has fortune dealt you some bad cards. Then let wisdom make you a good gamester.
name: Francis Quarles

quote: The greatest wisdom is to realize one's lack of it.
name: Constantin Stanislavski

quote: It's very hard to know what wisdom is.
name: James Hillman

quote: I always prayed that God would give me the wisdom and the vision to do the things on this earth that I was supposed to do to express His life and love and His will.

quote: Never accept ultimatums, conventional wisdom, or absolutes.

quote: Contemplation and wisdom are highest achievements and man is not totally at home with them.

quote: There is no knowledge, no light, no wisdom that you are in possession of, but what you have received it from some source.

quote: The wisdom of the wise, and the experience of ages, may be preserved by quotation.

quote: Putting is like wisdom - partly a natural gift and partly the accumulation of experience.

quote: I am a poor student sitting at the feet of giants, yearning for their wisdom and begging for lessons that might one day make me a complete artist, so that if all goes well, I may one day sit beside them.

quote: Of all our possessions, wisdom alone is imortal.

quote: Wisdom is the knowledge of good and evil, not the strength to choose between the two.

quote: I have sympathy for young people, for their growing pains, but I balk when these growing pains are pushed into the foreground, when you make these young people the only vehicles of life's wisdom.

quote: Unhappy is that Grandeur which makes us too great to be good and that Wit which sets us at a distance from true Wisdom.

quote: Imagination allows us to escape the predictable. It enables us to reply to the common wisdom that we cannot soar by saying, 'Just watch!'

quote: Books are the ever burning lamps of accumulated wisdom.

quote: My past is my wisdom to use today... my future is my wisdom yet to experience. Be in the present because that is where life resides.

quote: Surely, God on high has not refused to give us enough wisdom to find ways to bring us an improvement in relations between the two great nations on earth.

quote: Normally street children are shown in terms of the tragedy of their lives - which is true - but there's also another dimension: their wisdom, dignity and enormous capacity for survival.

quote: What is all wisdom save a collection of platitudes?
name: Norman Douglas

quote: The sublimity of wisdom is to do those things living, which are to be desired when dying.
name: Norman Douglas

quote: As great as Ed is, the wisdom out here is that he can't carry a movie. They'll pay him $3 million to be the second banana in Julia Roberts things. But they won't put up $3 million for an Ed Harris movie.

quote: We learned in World War II that no single nation holds a monopoly on wisdom, morality or right to power, but that we must fight for the weak and promote democracy.

quote: The Divine of the Lord in heaven is love, for the reason that love is receptive of all things of heaven, such as peace, intelligence, wisdom and happiness.

quote: You know how people always talk about how vision is the key to entrepreneurship and perseverance and really seeing what other people don't see? We can actually redeem a fair amount of that folk wisdom.

quote: Women's strength, women's industry, women's wisdom are humankind's greatest untapped resource. The challenge then for U.N. Women is to show our diverse constituencies how this resource can be effectively tapped in ways that benefit us all.

quote: We all have within us a deep wisdom, but sometimes we don't know we have it.

quote: We live in a culture that doesn't acknowledge or validate human intuition and doesn't encourage us to rely on our intuitive wisdom.

quote: The thing that we possess, that machines don't, is the ability to exhibit wisdom.

quote: Without wisdom, the future has no meaning, no valuable purpose.

quote: You can practice to attain knowledge, but you can't practice to attain wisdom.

quote: And when the world is created, it is created in such a way that those eternal objects of God's loving wisdom become actualities - interacting with one another, relating to God in the finite realm.

quote: The beginning of wisdom is to desire it.

quote: This fear of the Lord is indeed the beginning of wisdom. This consciousness of sin is the straight pathway to heaven.

quote: I've led a school whose faculty and students examine and discuss and debate every aspect of our law and legal system. quote: The ultimate wisdom which deals with beginnings, remains locked in a seed. There it lies, the simplest fact of the universe and at the same time the one which calls faith rather than reason.

quote: For the subtlest folly proceeds from the subtlest wisdom.

quote: I do interviews because it's a chance to be myself. I sometimes wonder what I could have to say that would be of any interest. I don't have any great wisdom.

quote: This is perhaps the most profound meaning of the book of Job, the best example of wisdom.

quote: Wisdom finds its literary expression in wisdom literature.
name: Paul Ricoeur

quote: It is not from reason that justice springs, but goodness is born of wisdom.
name: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: Wisdom is keeping a sense of fallibility of all our views and opinions.
name: Gerald Brenan

name: Ray LaMontagne

quote: Even by common wisdom, there seem to be both people and objects in my dream that are outside myself, but clearly they were created in myself and are part of me, they are mental constructs in my own brain.

quote: When I wrote Living in the Light, I wanted to share about how I live my own life and to encourage people to tap into their own inner wisdom.
name: Shakti Gawain

quote: There is a universal, intelligent, life force that exists within everyone and everything. It resides within each one of use as a deep wisdom, an inner knowing. name: Shakti Gawain

quote: I have no agenda except to be funny. Neither I or the writers profess to offer any worldly wisdom.

name: Solon

quote: Wisdom too often never comes, and so one ought not to reject it merely because it comes late.
name: Felix Frankfurter

quote: Preconceived notions are the locks on the door to wisdom.
name: Merry Browne

quote: It is costly wisdom that is bought by experience.
name: Roger Ascham

quote: We have heeded no wisdom offering guidance.
name: Dora Russell

quote: To think the world therefore a general Bedlam, or place of madmen, and oneself a physician, is the most necessary point of present wisdom: an important imagination, and the way to happiness.
name: Thomas Traherne

quote: Mainstream media tend to just mouth the conventional wisdom, to see everything through the filter of right and left.
name: Arianna Huffington

quote: Pain is the doorway to wisdom and to truth.
name: Keith Miller

quote: I'm not a money manager, but I can tell you what the conventional wisdom is. The younger you are, the more risk you can take on.
name: Maria Bartiromo

quote: Dr. Johnson has said that the chief glory of a country arises from its authors. But then that is only as they are oracles of wisdom unless they teach virtue, they are more worthy of a halter than of the laurel.

quote: I covered my face because they had taken my wisdom teeth out.
name: Josh Brolin

quote: To keep your secret is wisdom to expect others to keep it is folly.
name: William Samuel Johnson

quote: But in its final creation it was not the part of the Father's power to fail as though exhausted. It was not the part of His wisdom to waver in a needful matter through poverty of counsel.
name: Giovanni Pico della Mirandola

quote: But I do think it's important to remember that writers do not have a monopoly of wisdom on their books. They can be wrong about their own books, they can often learn about their own books.

quote: Lord, give us the wisdom to utter words that are gentle and tender, for tomorrow we may have to eat them.

quote: In garden arrangement, as in all other kinds of decorative work, one has not only to acquire a knowledge of what to do, but also to gain some wisdom in perceiving what it is well to let alone.

quote: This land, which we have watered with our tears and our blood, is now our mother country, and we are well satisfied to stay where wisdom abounds and gospel is free.
name: Richard V. Allen

name: Thomas Reid

quote: Pessimism is only the name that men of weak nerves give to wisdom.
name: Bernard De Voto

quote: He whose wisdom cannot help him, gets no good from being wise.
name: Quintus Ennius

quote: Now it is time to turn to an older wisdom that, while respecting material comfort and security as a basic right of all, also recognises that many of the most valuable things in life cannot be measured.

quote: Words of wisdom are spoken by children at least as often as scientists.
name: James Newman

quote: Beauty, the eternal Spouse of the Wisdom of God and Angel of his Presence thru' all creation.
name: Robert Bridges

quote: Where fear is present, wisdom cannot be.
name: Lactantius

quote: Wisdom lies neither in fixity nor in change, but in the dialectic between the two.
name: Octavio Paz

quote: What I lack in energy, I have in wisdom.

quote: I have tried at every point to seek God's wisdom on the decisions I made, and I made it my business to speak up on behalf of the things God tells us are important to Him.

quote: But the Wisdom of God, which is His only-begotten Son, being in all respects incapable of change or alteration, and every good quality in Him being essential, and such as cannot be changed and converted, His glory is therefore declared to be pure and sincere.
name: Origen

quote: We thought, because we had power, we had wisdom.
name: Stephen Vincent Benet

quote: A monarchy conducted with infinite wisdom and infinite benevolence is the most perfect of all possible governments.
name: Ezra Stiles

quote: In justice to human society it may perhaps be said of almost all the polities and civil institutions in the world, however imperfect, that they have been founded in and carried on with very considerable wisdom.
name: Ezra Stiles

quote: The constitutions of Maryland and New York are founded in higher wisdom.
name: Ezra Stiles

quote: Conventional wisdom notwithstanding, there is no reason either in football or in poetry why the two should not meet in a man's life if he has the weight and cares about the words.
name: Archibald MacLeish

quote: You know, it's sort of common wisdom among New York publishers that short story collections don't make money.
name: Chad Harbach

quote: Wisdom and goodness are twin-born, one heart must hold both sisters, never seen apart.
name: William Dean Howells

quote: Doubt the conventional wisdom unless you can verify it with reason and experiment.

quote: What's different now is that while political leaders used to give talking points to talk radio, now talk-radio hosts are giving talking points to political leaders. name: John Avlon

quote: Now all the knowledge and wisdom that is in creatures, whether angels or men, is nothing else but a participation of that one eternal, immutable and increased wisdom of God.

quote: Books should to one of these fours ends conduce, for wisdom, piety, delight, or use.
name: John Denham

quote: Your aim will be knowledge and wisdom, not the reflected glamour of fame.
name: Abbott L. Lowell

quote: I find the fact that billionaires are quoted as if the fact that they are billionaires gives them some kind of wisdom is outrageous.
name: Ben Elton

quote: The most important lesson of New Labour is this: Every time we made progress we did it by challenging the conventional wisdom.
name: Ed Miliband

quote: To know one's self is wisdom, but not to know one's neighbors is genius.
name: Minna Antrim

quote: A few years ago you couldn't go from TV to film. It was like a 'no no' but I believe when you find a plan and purpose that God has for your life, there's not anything man can do to you. Especially when your faith is not really standing in the wisdom of man, you're really standing in the wisdom of God.
name: Derek Luke

quote: I left school at 16 but I wish I'd gone to university - I think I would have studied English literature. I had a knack for that. But I don't think you have the kind of wisdom at 16 to make that decision.
name: Brendan Coyle

quote: It is not white hair that engenders wisdom.
name: Menander

quote: As far as feeling freedom in my career now versus five years ago... I think if I feel any more free it's simply because of the experiences that I've had, and the wisdom I've accumulated from that time.
name: Mary Chapin Carpenter

quote: The current wisdom now is that if the three networks are covering the news the same way the difference is the anchor people. I think that won't be true in the future.
name: Roone Arledge

quote: All human wisdom works and has worries and grief as reward.
name: Johann Georg Hamann

quote: He read his mind. He's a strange sort of man, isn't he? It's not just the advice and the wisdom that he has.

quote: Remembering is painful, it's difficult, but it can be inspiring and it can give wisdom.
name: Paul Greengrass

quote: Most things break, including hearts. The lessons of life amount not to wisdom, but to scar tissue and callus.
name: Wallace Stegner

quote: Losing faith in your own singularity is the start of wisdom, I suppose also the first announcement of death.
name: Peter Conrad

quote: If they can prove that I am wrong by that time, I will give it up to their wisdom, but not after to any one's judgment, till I see the end of another year for the Lord will begin with a new century and I will see what he will do, before I will hearken to any man's judgment.
name: Joanna Southcott

quote: You want people walking away from the conversation with some kernel of wisdom or some kind of impact.
name: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: Follow the wisdom of the great actor, James Cagney, you hit your mark, you look the other guy in the eye, and you tell the truth.
name: Larry Merchant

quote: The seven wise men of Greece, so famous for their wisdom all the world over, acquired all that fame, each of them, by a single sentence consisting of two or three words.
name: Robert South

quote: This age thinks better of a gilded fool Than of a threadbare saint in wisdom's school.
name: Thomas Dekker

quote: The 'wisdom of the crowds' is the most ridiculous statement I've heard in my life. Crowds are dumb.
name: Drew Curtis

quote: However, I must not indulge in homespun wisdom here before so distinguished an assembly, especially as I am to be followed by a representative of science.
name: Knut Hamsun

quote: Wisdom alone is true ambition's aim, wisdom the source of virtue, and of fame, obtained with labour, for mankind employed, and then, when most you share it, best enjoyed.
name: William Whitehead

quote: Writing is no dying art form in America because most published writers here accept the wisdom and the necessity of encouraging the talent that follows in their footsteps.
name: Elizabeth George

quote: Much of the wisdom of one age, is the folly of the next.
name: Charles Simmons

quote: I have studied many philosophers and many cats. The wisdom of cats is infinitely superior.
name: Hippolyte Taine

quote: Courage is always the surest wisdom.
name: Wilfred Grenfell

quote: The study of history is the beginning of political wisdom.
name: Jean Bodin

quote: Learning how to get in tune with your field of energy and understand how to create your energy, expand that energy, and move that energy through your body. Coming back to your center, and approaching life from that center-to-line place... That to me gave me strength and understanding and hopefully wisdom to solve life's problems and challenges.
name: Erin Gray

quote: India is known for its sobriety and wisdom, balanced and sensible thinking. We need strong institutions and we need good governance in the country.
name: Pratibha Patil

quote: I love the music of Lauryn Hill and Erykah Badu and more recently the music of Laura Marling. All these women share a strength and a wisdom in their voices and music that really makes me want to make music and sing.
name: Lianne La Havas

quote: The arts, quite simply, nourish the soul. They sustain, comfort, inspire. There is nothing like that exquisite moment when you first discover the beauty of connecting with others in celebration of larger ideals and shared wisdom.
name: Gordon Gee

quote: Any successful nominee should possess both the temperament to interpret the law and the wisdom to do so fairly. The next Supreme Court Justice should have a record of protecting individual rights and a strong willingness to put aside any political agenda.
name: Bennie Thompson

quote: After all my possessions had been burned, God gave me the wisdom to return to Jerusalem.
name: Shmuel Y. Agnon

quote: I am not one who was born in the custody of wisdom I am one who is fond of olden times and intense in quest of the sacred knowing of the ancients.
name: Gustave Courbet

quote: They see me as being this Super Mom on TV who also can more than handle a difficult husband, and they assume I'm going to be just full of wisdom as a mother and wife myself.
name: Patricia Richardson

quote: During the long process of history, by relying on our own diligence, courage and wisdom, Chinese people have opened up a good and beautiful home where all ethnic groups live in harmony and fostered an excellent culture that never fades.
name: Xi Jinping

quote: It may be assumed as an axiom that Providence has never gifted any political party with all of political wisdom or blinded it with all of political folly.
name: John George Nicolay

quote: Wisdom prepares for the worst, but folly leaves the worst for the day when it comes.
name: Richard Cecil

quote: To comprehend the Wisdom of this Injunction the better, and explain the Duty before us, it should be considered, that Government is the only Means by which human Happiness can be attained.
name: Charles Inglis

quote: But the law of God came from heaven indeed. God wrote it with his finger, it is the fountain of all wisdom, and therefore shall it continue for ever, and never have an end.
name: John Jewel

quote: They are few in the midst of an overwhelming mass of brute force, and their submission is wisdom but for a nation like England to submit to be robbed by any invader who chooses to visit her shores seemed to me to be nonsense.
name: George Combe

quote: Wisdom is a kind of knowledge. It is knowledge of the nature, career, and consequences of human values.
name: Sidney Hook

quote: There's always a miasma of misinformation emerging from the higher education sector as to which are the 'best' courses to take. My advice would always be to ignore the perceived wisdom and look for the most reliable evidence on the ground.
name: David Puttnam

quote: Memory is not wisdom idiots can by rote repeat volumes. Yet what is wisdom without memory?
name: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quote: I continue to believe, contrary to the given wisdom, that it's more interesting to have an album - or, indeed, an individual song - which has variety rather than homogeneity.
name: Peter Hammill

quote: Be there a will, and wisdom finds a way.
name: George Crabbe

quote: I see a wiser person than when I was younger: having babies, and passing 30, were the turning points. What women in their 40s - I am 39 - lack in gorgeousness, they make up for in wisdom. I love ageing, despite the drawbacks - thinner, drier skin.
name: Thandie Newton

quote: Knowledge is the consequence of time, and multitude of days are fittest to teach wisdom.
name: Jeremy Collier

quote: Books give not wisdom where none was before. But where some is, there reading makes it more.
name: Elizabeth Hardwick

quote: And it is no less true, that personal security and private property rest entirely upon the wisdom, the stability, and the integrity of the courts of justice.
name: Joseph Story

quote: Wisdom sails with wind and time.
name: John Florio

quote: To avoid entangling alliances has been a maxim of our policy ever since the days of Washington, and its wisdom no one will attempt to dispute.
name: James Buchanan

quote: Your law may be perfect, your knowledge of human affairs may be such as to enable you to apply it with wisdom and skill, and yet without individual acquaintance with men, their haunts and habits, the pursuit of the profession becomes difficult, slow, and expensive.
name: William Dunbar

quote: I don't want to put a pause on the rest of my life I'm really enjoying getting older and the wisdom that comes from that.
name: Rosemarie DeWitt

quote: As an instrument for practical action, law is responsive to the wisdom of its time, which may be wrong, but it carries forward, sometimes in opposition to this wisdom or passion, a memory of received values.
name: Edward Levi

quote: And, if we have any evidence that the wisdom which formed the plan is in the man, we have the very same evidence, that the power which executed it is in him also.
name: Thomas Reid

quote: While many of us never knew Ronald Reagan personally, we felt close to him because we shared his lighthearted sense of humor, admired his uncommon virtue, and were moved by his remarkable wisdom.
name: Randy Forbes

quote: What could be more lonely than to be enveloped in silence, to be the last of your people to speak your native tongue, to have no way to pass on the wisdom of the elders, to anticipate the promise of the children. This tragic fate is indeed the plight of someone somewhere roughly every two weeks.
name: Wade Davis

quote: I chose Sony Classics, not just because of their practical experience, not just because of their wisdom in marketing, but mainly because of their integrity.
name: Arthur Cohn

quote: If the highest things are unknowable, then the highest capacity or virtue of man cannot be theoretical wisdom.
name: Leo Strauss

quote: We don't pray for the land. We pray for the humans, all humans... starting with the president, Mohammed Morsi, and all officials, and for God to give everyone wisdom and responsibility to manage the affairs of this country and its people in true Egyptian spirit.
name: Pope Theodoros II

quote: Hatred is corrosive of a person's wisdom and conscience the mentality of enmity can poison a nation's spirit, instigate brutal life and death struggles, destroy a society's tolerance and humanity, and block a nation's progress to freedom and democracy.
name: Liu Xiaobo

quote: Instead of looking at life as a narrowing funnel, we can see it ever widening to choose the things we want to do, to take the wisdom we've learned and create something.
name: Liz Carpenter

quote: I think in conventional magazine wisdom, you need to have a redesign every decade or so.
name: Timothy White

quote: One reason the human race has such a low opinion of itself is that it gets so much of its wisdom from writers.
name: Wilfrid Sheed

quote: In regard of the rich grace and wisdom of his love toward his people for who sees not, but that it is a curse to be unready as these foolish virgins, who were therefore shut out.
name: Thomas Shepard

quote: Knowledge is a process of piling up facts wisdom lies in their simplification.
name: Martin Henry Fischer

quote: The result showed the wisdom of your orders.
name: John Bigelow

quote: I actually think with age comes some level of wisdom.
name: Nina Totenberg

quote: This ceremony and the intellectual aura associated with the Nobel Prizes have grown from the wisdom of a practical chemist who wrote a remarkable will.
name: Stanford Moore

quote: Wisdom denotes the pursuing of the best ends by the best means.
name: Francis Hutcheson

quote: A proverb is the wisdom of many and the wit of one.
name: Lord John Russell

quote: Yale is a crucible in American life for the accommodation of intellectual achievement, of wisdom, of refinement, with the democratic ideals of openness, of social justice and of equal opportunity.
name: Benno C. Schmidt, Jr.
